metadata.title: CVE-2016-6802 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache Shiro before 1.3.2 allows attackers to bypass intended servletfilters and gain access by leveraging use of a non-root servlet contextpath.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: shiro package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-2').
